report.title: UKBMS: Timed Count Grid Report
report.description: A report designed to be used with the report_calendar_grid, when configured for Timed Counts. Filtered according to the Indicia ID (not CMS). Dates are actually defined on Child samples.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM samples s JOIN samples ss on s.id=ss.parent_id and ss.deleted=false JOIN surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id and su.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt on ctt.id=s.sample_method_id #joins# WHERE s.deleted = FALSE AND s.parent_id IS NULL AND #website_filter# AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (CAST(s.sample_method_id AS character varying)='#sample_method_id#' OR '#sample_method_id#'='' OR ctt.term='#sample_method_id#') #order_by#
report.field_sql: s.id as sample_id, su.title as survey, s.location_name as location_name, s.entered_sref, ss.date_start, ss.date_end, ss.date_type

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the user

param.name: sample_method_id
param.description: Select the sample method, or leave blank to not filter by sample method.
